title: Temple Natura
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Fusion, Colombian
description: A peaceful urban oasis under the shelter of fruit trees is the setting to unwind and relax. Enjoy in-house-made vegan and vegetarian food, plus drinks such as fruit smoothies, cocktails, teas, chai, lemonade. Uses local, seasonal and organic ingredients. Also is a space where art exhibitions, workshops and conferences related to wellness and spiritual development are held. Additionally, a bio shop is on premises.
